data.title: Guatemala Music Review | Ricardo Arjona Music Video
data.meta_description: Not only should this video represent Guatemala Tourism which it does indirectly as this song unfolds using Guatemala as the back drop. 33 million views has not hurt the Guatemala Tourism Industry.
data.text:
Biography

File

Full name: Edgar Ricardo Arjona Morales

Alias: Ricardo Arjona, Arjona, ‘disservice’

Birthday: January 19, 1964

Place of Birth: Jocotenango – Guatemala

Genre: Pop

Instrument (s): Voice, guitar, piano

Time: 1985 – Present

Ricardo Arjona

Edgar Morales, known in the artistic ambience as Ricardo Arjona, is a Guatemalan singer-songwriter, who has been nominated for three Grammys and won two Grammy (2007) and Latin Grammy (2006), both for his album “Inside” (2005). Born in the town of Jocotenango, near Antigua Guatemala on January 19, 1964, son of Don Ricardo Arjona Moscoso and Mrs. Naomi Morales Arjona. At 3 years old, his family moved to Guatemala City where he lived throughout his childhood and was able to start their academic studies and music.

My love of spanish music covers the entire range. Daddy Yankee and aventura ”aventura” are a few of my favorite interests in the world of Spanish recording artists.

Now Ricardo Arjona – Fuiste tú feat. Gaby Moreno (Video Oficial) © 2012 Metamorphosis Enterprises Limited / Distributed exclusively by WMG You’re the feat. Gaby Moreno (Official Video)

The producers of this music video decided to film as the backdrop of this song Guatemala, cover all the main tourist or tourism areas of Guatemala. The video covers Tikal, Guatemala City, Lake Atitlan, Livingston and many other areas of Guatemala depicted these locations in there splendor and beauty.

The video as the story unfolds focus more on the artists featured with back grounds faded out to feature the artist while still giving you a view of for example the famous Arch of Antigua Guatemala as a back drop.
